name: Taming.io
description: Gather resources to build a shelter and prepare for the night. Unlock weapons to protect yourself from hostile creatures and other players. Tame animals to protect yourself. Icons determine your level in the game. To earn higher badges, you need to improve your score in the game. Your top 10 games are saved for 14 days. So you can win badges and lose badges! Your icon gives you free Golden apples every day.
